name: WebGL2RenderingContext.framebufferTextureLayer
description: The WebGL2RenderingContext.framebufferTextureLayer() method of the WebGL 2 API attaches a single layer of a texture to a framebuffer.

refs.name: WebGL 2.0
refs.description: The definition of 'framebufferTextureLayer' in the 'WebGL 2.0' specification.

refs.name: OpenGL ES 3.0
